verses.verse: <S%H271>Ahaz<s%> was <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> when he began to <S%H4427>reign;<s%> and he <S%H4427>reigned<s%> <S%H8337>sixteen<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem:<s%> and he <S%H6213>didn't<s%> do that which was <S%H3477>right<s%> in the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> like <S%H1732>David<s%> his <S%H1>father;<s%>
but he walked <S%H3212>in<s%> the <S%H1870>ways<s%> of the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H6213>made<s%> also molten <S%H4541>images<s%> for the <S%H1168>Baals.<s%>

Moreover he burnt <S%H6999>incense<s%> in the <S%H1516>valley<s%> of the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2011>Hinnom,<s%> and <S%H1197>burnt<s%> his <S%H1121>children<s%> in the <S%H784>fire,<s%> according to the <S%H8441>abominations<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations<s%> whom <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> cast <S%H3423>out<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
He <S%H2076>sacrificed<s%> and burnt <S%H6999>incense<s%> in the high <S%H1116>places,<s%> and on the <S%H1389>hills,<s%> and under every <S%H7488>green<s%> <S%H6086>tree.<s%>

Therefore <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> his <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>delivered<s%> him into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H758>Syria;<s%> and they <S%H5221>struck<s%> <S%H7617>him,<s%> and carried away of his a great <S%H1419>multitude<s%> of <S%H7633>captives,<s%> and <S%H935>brought<s%> them to <S%H1834>Damascus.<s%> He was also <S%H5414>delivered<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> who <S%H5221>struck<s%> him with a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4347>slaughter.<s%>

For <S%H6492>Pekah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7425>Remaliah<s%> <S%H2026>killed<s%> in <S%H3063>Judah<s%> one <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> in <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> all of them <S%H2428>valiant<s%> <S%H1121>men;<s%> because they had <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers.<s%>

<S%H2147>Zichri,<s%> a mighty <S%H1368>man<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> <S%H2026>killed<s%> <S%H4641>Maaseiah<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H1121>son,<s%> and <S%H5840>Azrikam<s%> the <S%H5057>ruler<s%> of the <S%H1004>house,<s%> and <S%H511>Elkanah<s%> who was <S%H4932>next<s%> to the <S%H4428>king.<s%>

The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> carried away <S%H7617>captive<s%> of their <S%H251>brothers<s%> two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H505>thousand,<s%> <S%H802>women,<s%> <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and <S%H1323>daughters,<s%> and took also <S%H962>away<s%> <S%H7227>much<s%> <S%H7998>spoil<s%> from <S%H935>them,<s%> and brought the <S%H7998>spoil<s%> to <S%H8111>Samaria.<s%>

But a <S%H5030>prophet<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> was <S%H8034>there,<s%> whose name was <S%H5752>Oded:<s%> and he went <S%H3318>out<s%> to <S%H6440>meet<s%> the <S%H6635>army<s%> that <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H8111>Samaria,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3068>them,<s%> "Behold, because Yahweh, the <S%H430>God<s%> of your <S%H1>fathers,<s%> was <S%H2534>angry<s%> with <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> he has <S%H5414>delivered<s%> them into your <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and you have <S%H2026>slain<s%> them in a <S%H2197>rage<s%> which has reached <S%H5060>up<s%> to <S%H8064>heaven.<s%>

Now you <S%H559>purpose<s%> to keep <S%H3533>under<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> for <S%H5650>bondservants<s%> and <S%H8198>bondmaids<s%> for <S%H7535>yourselves.<s%> Aren't there even with you <S%H819>trespasses<s%> of your own against <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God?<s%>

Now <S%H8085>hear<s%> me <S%H7725>therefore,<s%> and send back the <S%H7633>captives,<s%> that you have taken <S%H7617>captive<s%> from your <S%H251>brothers;<s%> for the <S%H2740>fierce<s%> <S%H639>wrath<s%> of Yahweh is on <S%H3068>you.<s%>"

Then <S%H582>some<s%> of the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> <S%H5838>Azariah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3076>Johanan,<s%> <S%H1296>Berechiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4919>Meshillemoth,<s%> and <S%H3169>Jehizkiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7967>Shallum,<s%> and <S%H6021>Amasa<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2311>Hadlai,<s%> stood <S%H6965>up<s%> against those who <S%H935>came<s%> from the <S%H6635>war,<s%>

and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H935>them,<s%> "You shall not bring in the <S%H7633>captives<s%> <S%H559>here:<s%> for you purpose that which will bring on us a <S%H819>trespass<s%> against <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> to <S%H3254>add<s%> to our <S%H2403>sins<s%> and to our <S%H819>trespass;<s%> for our <S%H819>trespass<s%> is <S%H7227>great,<s%> and there is <S%H7227>fierce<s%> <S%H639>wrath<s%> against <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>"
So the armed <S%H2502>men<s%> <S%H5800>left<s%> the <S%H7633>captives<s%> and the <S%H961>spoil<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H8269>princes<s%> and all the <S%H6951>assembly.<s%>

The <S%H582>men<s%> who have been <S%H5344>mentioned<s%> by <S%H8034>name<s%> rose <S%H6965>up,<s%> and <S%H2388>took<s%> the <S%H7633>captives,<s%> and with the <S%H7998>spoil<s%> <S%H3847>clothed<s%> all who were <S%H4636>naked<s%> among <S%H3847>them,<s%> dressed <S%H5274>them,<s%> gave them sandals, and gave them something to <S%H398>eat<s%> and to <S%H8248>drink,<s%> <S%H5480>anointed<s%> <S%H5095>them,<s%> carried all the <S%H3782>feeble<s%> of them on <S%H2543>donkeys,<s%> and <S%H935>brought<s%> them to <S%H3405>Jericho,<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> of palm <S%H8558>trees,<s%> <S%H681>to<s%> their <S%H251>brothers.<s%> Then they <S%H7725>returned<s%> to <S%H8111>Samaria.<s%>
At that <S%H6256>time<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H271>Ahaz<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> to the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria<s%> to help <S%H5826>him.<s%>
For again the <S%H130>Edomites<s%> had <S%H935>come<s%> and <S%H5221>struck<s%> <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and carried <S%H7617>away<s%> <S%H7628>captives.<s%>

The <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> also had <S%H6584>invaded<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of the <S%H8219>lowland,<s%> and of the <S%H5045>South<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and had <S%H3920>taken<s%> Beth <S%H1053>Shemesh,<s%> and <S%H357>Aijalon,<s%> and <S%H1450>Gederoth,<s%> and <S%H7755>Soco<s%> with its <S%H1323>towns,<s%> and <S%H8553>Timnah<s%> with its <S%H1323>towns,<s%> <S%H1579>Gimzo<s%> also and its <S%H1323>towns:<s%> and they lived <S%H3427>there.<s%>

For <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H3665>brought<s%> <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H3665>low<s%> because of <S%H271>Ahaz<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> for he had <S%H6544>dealt<s%> <S%H6544>wantonly<s%> in <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and <S%H4603>trespassed<s%> <S%H4604>severely<s%> against <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
Tilgath <S%H8407>Pilneser<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H6696>him,<s%> and distressed <S%H2388>him,<s%> but didn't strengthen him.

For <S%H271>Ahaz<s%> took away a <S%H2505>portion<s%> out of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and out of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> and of the <S%H8269>princes,<s%> and <S%H5414>gave<s%> it to the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria:<s%> but it <S%H5833>didn't<s%> help him.
In the <S%H6256>time<s%> of his <S%H6887>distress,<s%> he <S%H4603>trespassed<s%> yet <S%H3254>more<s%> against <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> this same <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H271>Ahaz.<s%>

For he <S%H2076>sacrificed<s%> to the <S%H430>gods<s%> of <S%H1834>Damascus,<s%> which <S%H5221>struck<s%> <S%H559>him;<s%> and he said, "Because the <S%H430>gods<s%> of the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H758>Syria<s%> <S%H5826>helped<s%> <S%H2076>them,<s%> so I will sacrifice to <S%H5826>them,<s%> that they may help <S%H3782>me.<s%>" But they were the ruin of <S%H3478>him,<s%> and of all Israel.

<S%H271>Ahaz<s%> gathered <S%H622>together<s%> the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> and cut in <S%H7112>pieces<s%> the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> and shut <S%H5462>up<s%> the <S%H1817>doors<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> and he <S%H6213>made<s%> him <S%H4196>altars<s%> in every <S%H6438>corner<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

In every <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> he <S%H6213>made<s%> high <S%H1116>places<s%> to burn <S%H6999>incense<s%> to <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods,<s%> and provoked to <S%H3707>anger<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of his <S%H1>fathers.<s%>

Now the <S%H3499>rest<s%> of his <S%H1697>acts,<s%> and all his <S%H1870>ways,<s%> <S%H7223>first<s%> and <S%H314>last,<s%> <S%H3789>behold,<s%> they are written in the <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

<S%H271>Ahaz<s%> <S%H7901>slept<s%> with his <S%H1>fathers,<s%> and they <S%H6912>buried<s%> him in the <S%H5892>city,<s%> even in <S%H3389>Jerusalem;<s%> for they <S%H935>didn't<s%> bring him into the <S%H6913>tombs<s%> of the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> and <S%H3169>Hezekiah<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%> reigned in his <S%H4427>place.<s%>
